question: 基準
userExplanation: primarily refers to a standard or criterion that is used as a basis for judgment or evaluation
sourceMnemonic: The <kanji>foundation</kanji> of your <kanji>standard</kanji> is where you place your <vocabulary>standard</vocabulary>. No more, no less. This foundation is where the standard is all based off of.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
